text: Chandgaon Mosque (, ) is a mosque in Chittagong, Bangladesh, completed in 2007. Designed by Kashef Mahboob Chowdhury, it was shortlisted for the Aga Khan Award for Architecture in 2010. ==See also== * List of mosques in Bangladesh ==References== Category:Mosques in Chittagong Category:Mosques completed in 2007
title: Chandgaon Mosque
